author: National Geographic
description:
Celebrate the Christmas season with National Geographic and this Lost Treasures of the Bible MEGA Episode. Meet the archaeologists discovering new evidence and shedding new light on historic stories from the Bible. Featuring three full episodes: 

Secrets of the Tower of Babel
Archaeologists discover new evidence in Iraq that sheds light on the historical influences of the Bible’s epic Tower of Babel story. 

Mystery of King Soloman
King Solomon is famed for his wisdom and riches. Teams excavating ancient biblical kingdoms make new discoveries about the mysterious age of Solomon. 

The Real King Herod
King Herod is one of the Bible’s most evil characters. Now, new archaeological discoveries and 3D CGI reveal why he was known as “Herod the Great.” 

Lost Treasures of the Bible | S1

Watch more Lost Treasures of the Bible here on Disney+: https://on.natgeo.com/48m4fiH 

Explore the World with National Geographic subscriptions: http://natgeo.com/ytngmagazine

title: Uncover the Bible's Secrets | Lost Treasures of the Bible MEGA Episode | National Geographic
